abstract: Customers buying Barnes & Noble’s electronic reading device now will receive them next year.
snippet: Customers buying Barnes & Noble’s electronic reading device now will receive them next year.
lead_paragraph: Update | 1:56 p.m.  Added comment from a Forrester analyst on the e-reader shortage.Update | 3:00 p.m.  Added comment from Amazon.com.

headline.main: Barnes & Noble’s Nook Sold Out for the Holidays
